channel.title: Spectral Preprocessing on SpectralAnalysis: Software for the masses
channel.description: Recent content in Spectral Preprocessing on SpectralAnalysis: Software for the masses

item.title: Normalisation
item.description: Background The goal of normalisation is to scale the intensities of each pixel to remove systematic artefacts that affect intensity. For further reading on normalisation methods there are a number of articles that discuss this further Normalization in MALDI-TOF imaging datasets of proteins: practical considerations Robust data processing and normalization strategy for MALDI mass spectrometric imaging Exploring Ion Suppression in Mass Spectrometry Imaging of a Heterogeneous Tissue Applying a method in SpectralAnalysis Select a spectrum by clicking on a pixel in the image.
